export const escapeUri = uri => encodeURIComponent(uri).replace(/[!'()*]/g, hexEncode);
const hexEncode = c => `%${c.charCodeAt(0).toString(16).toUpperCase()}`;

sourcesContent:
export const escapeUri = (uri) => encodeURIComponent(uri).replace(/[!'()*]/g, hexEncode);
const hexEncode = (c) => `%${c.charCodeAt(0).toString(16).toUpperCase()}`;
